website_summaries.verdict: Sleek design and no sink necessary. Fits attractively into your life and budget.
pros: Reviews rave of the thorough drying capability that can remove deposits from clothing
Whisks away water that you may not expect from a spin dryer
cons: Does not work well with extremely damp clothing

customer_reviews.title: It rocks my rocks, err dries my swim suit!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spinner. I have a mini washing machine, but no dryer (although I'm going to invest in a panda dryer really soon). It gets a ton of water out of clothes. Just a spinner, not a dryer! I keep a LARGE glass bowl under the drain spout. I've had this for about a year and it still works perfectly. I'm just way slow at doing the review! 😂 I'm also an avid swimmer, so I put my bathing suit in it all the time after hitting up pools or the lake. I'm also very very happy that I threw a little money at it and got the 3200 rpm!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Maddock

customer_reviews.title: This Dryer is AWESOME.....
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says....If your are looking for a Dryer with heat you need to read better...This does not have heat but it takes ALL of the water out of the clothes so that by the time you take them out they are 90% dry. Only need to hang and they are dry within of hours instead of a couple of days!! Saves on energy bills too!! BUY THIS YOU WON'T BE DISAPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisamarie Benito

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to this one!
customer_reviews.text: Did my first load! Quick shipment and easy to set up... Fits my whole load. of laundry, very stable as far as shaking, and I swear it gets more water out than my smaller spinner!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great spin dryer
customer_reviews.text: The spin dryer came well packaged. I have a minor dent though, but not a big deal. It works as expected. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aila

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but could be awesome.
customer_reviews.text: So... it works amazingly, but not as advertised. 3,200 RPM is what I was sold on, and 2,800 RPM is what I got. I tested this spinner with both a laser tachometer and a vibrational tachometer. Since it performs at only 87% of what was promised, it earns only 87% of a perfect score.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bieber

customer_reviews.title: Works great in bathtub with cup as spout extender
customer_reviews.text: Really love this dryer and just wanted to share a tip for anyone else who puts this in a bathtub for use. I was concerned because water coming out of the spout was splashing back onto the unit itself. I don’t want it to rust and don’t want to dry the outside after each use. I took a large plastic disposable drink cup, cut off the bottom, shoved it bottom-end-first onto the spout, and taped it in place with duct tape. With this spout extender, water no longer splashes back onto the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Spins crazy fast!
customer_reviews.text: Spins crazy fast! I washed a small load of laundry in our Maytag residential washing machine, and when the spin cycle was done, I moved the load into this Panda, just out of curiosity, to see if it could remove any additional water from the clothes, AFTER the residential washer completed it's cycles. I was very surprised to see about half a GALLON of water come out of the Panda, holy toledo! This thing really works! After about 3 minutes the water was just dripping out, so I removed the clothes and they were just barely damp, like they would probably be dry in less than an hour if I hung them up. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Boondocking Adventures dot com

customer_reviews.title: I love this Spin-Dryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than I expected. My clothes come out extremely dry, and only require another 30 minutes of air drying to be completely dry. It seems very well-made, and the inside is a stainless steel tub which seems very heavy and nice. Spins pretty quietly. I originally had a hand cranked Spin dryer, but this is much much better, and now I can do several loads of clothes much faster than before. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Removes water great; leaks underneath, spins off balance if items within aren’t sitting ‘just right’
customer_reviews.text: Some water accumulates between the stainless steel and black bottom rim area and leaks out the bottom open slit areas near feet. Sometimes I have to reload the wet items if it seems off balance even though I always try to load everything evenly. There is not an excess of water in the wet items. This dryer does a very good job of removing the water; happy with that. I just wish water would not leak out underneath the black rimmed area at the bottom and it is too bad the machine acts up with banging around if the items aren’t sitting ‘just right’ within.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: Panda 3200 RPM - Perfect Spin Dryer
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say is awesome. I have a Panda washer but the spin basket is small. This product worked just like seen on the videos by other buyers. I am impressed that the clothes were almost bone dry. Following the instructions for loading, I actually stopped the machine before the 5 minute automatic stop. At 2 minutes, my clothes were almost dry to the touch. I air dried them while watching TV and put them away dry before bed. This is going to make all my workout clothes more manageable in the summer months. This spins as well as any large washer with 3200 rpm that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!!! So Happy!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing clothes dry soo much faster now! My kids polyester & or microfiber items definitely became dry with just using this spinner alone not needing extra drying; Some things dried after using the panda spinner within 10-15mins. This honestly is the best thing I've bought in a long time! Just came in yesterday! I would HIGHLY suggest for a new mom for baby items to wash and dry quicker, Rv's, clothes line, to go along with your name brand dryer, cheap dryer or even air drying. Amazing Price even better! Shook, vibrated, move around a lot on my 1st use. After that so quiet like it wasn't on. Mrs. McDonald
customer_reviews.author: McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Spin Dryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is better quality than a different spin dryer I had. I like the brake feature automatically engaging during stopping of the spin cycle. The only issue I have is opening the top after a load. If my hands are wet, there really is no place to get a good hold and not slip off the cover. I think the top cover will become easier to open with use. Spins the water out of clothes just great. Great for washing gym clothes. This model accepts a good sized load, and no issues with balance. I have not yet had to reorganize a load due to imbalance.
customer_reviews.author: Groot

customer_reviews.title: For it's short life it was great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Panda Spin Dryer in March for occasional use. I spin and weave so wanted a device to spin our my handspun yarn or hand woven items. It worked great for 7 months and if it continued to spin I would have given it 5 starts. Now it will only beep but not spin. Amazon suggests I contact the vendor in China! This is not acceptable - an occasionally used item only lasting for 7 months. Used maybe 10 times following the directions. I feel let down by Amazon. I purchased it form them . They don't back the items they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one (Panda) since the one from Laundry Alternative was not strong enough. This one is 32rpm which is ideal to get all the water extracted from the clothes. My friends are so impressed that they are all buying one as well
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I already LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this spin dryer yesterday, and so far I've only done one load with it, but it was very easy to use and got the clothes super dry. Dry enough to hang on an indoor clothesline without any worry that they might drip. I expect them to be completely dry within the next few hours. I did five t-shirts, several pairs of underwear, three pairs of socks, and a set of long-sleeve pajamas; all the items are cotton. The water coming from the spout slowed to almost a drip in just a couple of minutes. I agree with other reviewers who say the Panda gets clothing drier than a washer's spin cycle does.
customer_reviews.author: SewAwesome

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got this after reading all the stellar reviews. I ran a small load to test it, and clothes do come out damp, as advertised. I was line drying outside, but I live in FL and the humid summer season is already upon us. My last load was still damp after 24 hours, so I got this. The unit worked as promised, and once it settles into the spin (takes a few seconds), it's quiet. Less than half filled, it still managed to spin out about two cups of water. Impressive! Update: Finally did a FULL load. Had to run it through the spin dryer in two sections, but look at the water it extracted! Check photo.
customer_reviews.author: L. King

customer_reviews.title: So far it's working very very well!. Be ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's working very very well!. Be sure to place your bucket down before you put your items in the spin dryer, as excess water comes out straight away prior to turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Essential - Fantastic machine!
customer_reviews.text: This spin dryer works Great! We put all our clothes through this machine before they go into the regular clothes dryer, it cuts the drying time WAY down and saves electricity. After putting light clothing through this spin dryer the drying time is literally just a few minutes. When putting heavy clothes like blue jeans or towels in the spin dryer, there is ALWAYS allot of water that comes out of them, reducing the drying time a huge amount! Great machine! Well worth the money! Probably already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Burke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this device! We use it in our RV. It actually spins dry twin size fleece blankets. They were absolutely running water when I loaded them, completely unrung. I also put up to 4 pairs of Levi's with no problem. When the device first starts spinning I hold the top sides of it for about 5 seconds and then it levels out. After I line dry the clothing it comes out very soft, all of the soap and chemicals completely gone. Now that I am aware of what the Panda can do I plan to do much more line dried clothing at home. You will be hooked on the results!
customer_reviews.author: pamala bawn

customer_reviews.title: Wrings out water that my regular washer does not spin out.  Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! It extracted 1/2 cup of water from a regular load of towels that my regular washer's spin cycle could not do. It is quiet, built well, and takes up very little space. Definitely very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: This is worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product, it is very quiet and it works perfectly fine, mine came without no damages to the product at all and yes it is very true about what other people are saying about the balancing.. Make sure your location is leveled upon were you want it to be.. Other then that I have no problems thus far.. Again I totally recommend this product to anyone who is looking to save money on your laundry needs.
customer_reviews.author: ChaosHead X

customer_reviews.title: Same as a washer with a good spin cycle
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I didn't want to buy a huge dryer but was thinking that fall will be coming soon and I will need my clothes to dry faster. On first try, I thought it was pretty quiet. I wouldn't say the t-shirts and jeans or towels came out that dry, but the very thin materials you can just hang right up after. It was the equivalent to when I put on the second spin cycle setting on my washer. I wish I would have put my money towards a mini dryer instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly works!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations but was desperate. So I gave this a shot, due to a great review video posted here. I was blown away by how quickly it takes to spin clothes (5 min.) to a dry enough state to air dry them. It didn't take too much longer to completely dry while hanging, even indoors. Note that it doesn't completely dry items, but it gets out most of the moisture. I had assumed it would take 30 min. just to get it to this state, but it's about 5 minutes per load. The drum is also pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like this but no
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this but it is not a good fit for us. It releases an electrical burning odor when used, the plastic protector that’s supposed to go inside keeps getting sliced and releases small shavings, and the dryer spins and bangs into the wall upon starting and when the cycle finishes. Had to reinforce it staying in place with clothing but I feel like doing so is a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My panda dryer stop spinning.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this machine on January 5th, now it is about 5 months since I'm using this machine and stop working. Could someone help me to fix the problem? It's not spinning at all...
customer_reviews.author: Pjlifechanging

customer_reviews.title: Works great... this is not a toy... Read and follow the manufacturer's instructions when using
customer_reviews.text: Love this product... Follow instructions always put the heavy items at the bottom and pack clothes to remove air spaces or else the machine will vibrate intensely... This is not a toy if it's not balanced you better turn the machine off hold it down some water is extracted... Love this machine works great... Can dry a load of clothes using a fan in about an hour at the very most... Or at least dry enough to wear
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Handwashing is a great way to keep your clothes brighter and in better ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for hand washing clothes. Handwashing is a great way to keep your clothes brighter and in better quality but drying is such a pain. The item runs for 5 minutes your clothes are nearly dry, just need a couple hours of air drying. The item is slightly bigger than I expected. It can handle a fairly large load of clothes (just be sure your bucket/bowel is big enough to handle the water, I over flowed the first time) I love this item, my only complaint is the on switch (which locks the lid down) feels a bit light and cheap. Must have for anyone living in the city without space for a washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: It is very hard to move a operation lever.
customer_reviews.text: I just figured out how to operate it after struggling over half hour. The problem was " the operation lever was not easy to push to ON section." I called PRODUCT SUPPORT to ask if I was doing to correct way to start machine, otherwise it was broken. The operation staff immediately ask me if I wanted to initiate replacement. When I ask the support of this product, the person texted" we are not technician. They have a technical knowledge. do you want to initiate return?" While chatting, I pushed the lever so hard with my both hands. Then the spin started working! I might have the same problem even though I got replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is a great product. It does exactly what it is supposed to do. It extracts water from your laundered clothes. They come out I would say about ninety percent dry. Mine came within five days. It appears to be sturdy and runs perfect. I've seen videos on YouTube where they say its loud but does not appear to be that loud. Much quiter than washer and dryer. A nd it holds so much more than you would think when looking at its size in comparison to washer and dryer. I've used mine tonight sttaight out of box and I've done five loads of clothes luckily split. Will come back and repost in about three months
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I never knew I needed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has made apartment life SO much easier. The bad: you do have to do a little experimenting to figure out how much you can load and if you're loading heavier items, may have to hold it down for a moment while it gets it's momentum. The good: you can put in soaking wet jeans and five minutes later they will be nearly completely dry - socks, underwear, t-shirts, bras, etc. often come out dry enough to wear. My only regret is not buying this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it with the Wonder Wash and a small dryer and it is worth it! You will have to make sure it's stable at the initial start up but once it gets going, it is okay. Thing seriously drys out sopping wet clothes to the point of mild dampness. You could go from there and just hang dry but I prefer a small dryer that I vent out onto my patio. Works wonders! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Macon

customer_reviews.title: It worked great exactly once and then stopped altogether
customer_reviews.text: This machine looked great and we were excited and tried it today and put in 3 shirts and they came out perfectly near-dry. We loved it.... until I tried a pair of joggers and did the exact same thing and turned it on, heard a short and quiet beep and... nothing. Nothing after that helped, waiting, changing outlets, taking it out and putting the joggers back in, etc etc NOTHING So disappointed, returning this and hoping to find a brand that is really worth it. I saw videos of one that looked decent but was beeping a lot and crazy loud which we don't need here. Any suggestions please respond.
customer_reviews.author: my name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little clothes spinner
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works like a dream. Does exactly what is says it will do. Even gets a cup to two cups of water out of clothes that come from an old top loader washer, making the dry cycle take half as long, saving lots of money on electric bill. Very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Shavings in draining out of the water spout
customer_reviews.text: I need this product. But after 5 times using it there is small pieces of rubber shavings coming out in the drain spout
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We love this spin dryer! All our clothes are hung to dry now and this little spin dryer helps enormously. We had problems with the latch about 3-4 months after buying it but the company made good on the warranty and sent us another one, we just paid shipping. I would say the only drawback to this machine is that it does seem a little delicate, it probably wouldn’t stand rough handling, but if you take care to use it properly you shouldn’t have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love itttt! Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Seriously dries up the clothes up to 95%!!! I just hang my clothes to dry and within a few hours it's all dry. Love itttt! Buy it, you won't regret it. It's great for small places/apts/studio.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Will save time and energy.
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how quiet and efficient this machine is. I put in a very wet towel, the machine took out majority of the water in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice spin dryer
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the version with the washer attached, but the washer didn't drain well so I had to return it. This spins them fairly dry so you can hang them outside in the sun to and they will dry quicker. It is best to fill it as using it half full will sometimes imbalance the load and then it hops around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Earthvillage

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: The product would be beautiful but for a dent on the side. That aside this spinner is awesome! I purchased it because my 16 year old washing machine wont spin. So me being cheap until I figure out if I want to repair it or replace it purchased this clothes spinner. It spins the clothes to the point when I place them in the dryer they dry in half the time. Heavy sweaters are super light, the wetness reminds me of steamed cleaned clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Chigirl

customer_reviews.title: Put a drain connector on it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I put it in the pump shed for the pool. Spin dry swimsuits fast! Wish the drain was "connectable" instead of just leaking onto the ground or into a "bowl"
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I didn't quite think I'd love this quite as much as I do. But boy do I. Clothes were virtually dry [just damp] by the time I took them out. First load took the full five minute run...at about 4:30 it was down to drips & finished dripping by the time it slowed. Clothes were dry within a couple of hours. I was a bit afraid neighbors would hear....but even I barely heard. The whole thing was and is genuinely amazing. I don't now why I waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Patience Boston

customer_reviews.title: Energy saving device like no other.
customer_reviews.text: The Panda spin dryer is everything I expected and then some. It has a lock button on the front which helps keep the lid from coming open during use. The 3200 rpm speed makes my clothes almost dry when it's complete. That saved me time in the dryer and with 4500 watts of dryer power every second counts. This saves me a ton of energy using solar and battery power daily. I recommend every household have this dryer helper. If your dryer is on the fritz this will allow you to hang dry your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick USN Ret

customer_reviews.title: I never imagined so much water could be spun out of clothes.
customer_reviews.text: This spinner is amazing! The first load I spun was 5 2XL T-shirts (and I probably could have put a couple more in). I pressed them firmly down to the bottom as per the instructions, and held the unit secure until it came up to speed, and then I watched in amazement at how much water started coming out of the spout. After the cycle, it beeped, and when I removed my clothes, they were barely damp. I have never used a washing machine that spun clothes as efficiently as this spinner. If it were a hot, sunny day, you could just wear a T-shirt fresh out of the spinner, take a walk, and it'll be dry in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gage

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than wringing out clothes by hand
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It took some trial and error to figure out the best container to use to catch water but in the end, I placed the spinner on my bathroom sink counter and had the drain spout aimed towards the sink drain. Easier than using towels to have to clean up water on the floor from overflowing containers. I was so impressed by how dry the clothes are after use. I would recommend this to anyone who has to wash clothes by hand or if their dryer is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and hate to go to the laundromat. I used the Panda Spin Dryer for the first time today. I have a Panda mini washer that I bought years ago. I love them both. I was surprised at how dry the spin dryer got the clothing. I just need to hang them up on my clothes drying rack for a while and everything is ready to be folded and put away.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. Wrings clothes very dry. The only down side it that it is heavy, but that is because it is very well made. I do like to put it on the counter so the water drains directly into the sink. Great capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this spinner
customer_reviews.text: I need to hand wash many items. I do not have a washer and send out regular wash. This spins out so much water that the clothes are as light as before I washed them. I live in the mountains where the air and winds are dry. So within half an hour even sweaters and sweats are dry. I would advise that after use tip the machine over a bit to get out the last of any remaining water.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: It lasts for 4 months in one adult and one child household.
customer_reviews.text: The spinner worked well the first 4 months and then it started to have a draining problem. Less and less water comes out even though the machine is on...then suddenly a lot water comes out from the bottom of the machine, not from the drain spout. So the water floods all over in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Made life easier.
customer_reviews.text: This spin dryer is amazing. I work in the elements and I only have two work shirts. It is important to me that I come to work fresh everyday. I wash my shirts at night along with my under things. Wringing clothes out by hand a few times each week made my very hands sore. This spin dryer has made washing my clothes painless. I would say that the clothes are about 95% dry after spinning them. That includes denim jeans and full size bath towels. I would recommend it to anyone that frequently washes clothes by hand.
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: Could not be any happier! Better setup with a light portable than having an automatic washer.
customer_reviews.text: We are absolutely so pleased with our new purchase. I got this to partially replace a german model portable washer. We have a Kuppet 11 lb portable washer. Great team! Unbelievably easy to use, and once I caught on that it works in the bathtub on top of an appliance dolly, felt safer. Nice how the company put info stickers on the key features to let you know quickly and easily how to use it. I could say more but I have a sudden urge to go and 🏃 more loads of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Merrilee McCain

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh do I love this thing. I bought it for use in my fiber studio where I need to be spinning dry wet silk and wool fabric constantly and it works like a charm. It's nice and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Schwaller

customer_reviews.title: I use the Panda almost everyday
customer_reviews.text: I live alone in a 30’ RV Trailer and I don’t have a washer & dryer. I like to daily wash and rinse the clothes I’ve worn in my kitchen sink. I used to then roll them up in a heavy towel then hank them up to dry. That was not a great way to do it compared to the ‘Panda Spin Machine’. Even soaking wet, items can be put in and spun till they are rung-out so well, that the hang time to fully dry is MUCH SHORTER. This is a great machine and does what it says. Again, it’s not a clothes dryer, but it’s the best way to get your items ready to hang-dry.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Drain option
customer_reviews.text: I figured out a way to control drainage instead of having to empty buckets from under the drain spout. I use my gray water discharge for watering fruit trees on my property and this set up is working quite well. It also brings the machine up to a much better working height. It is all very stable and has no shaking or vibration during operation. The feet of the utility tub can be screwed into place for more stability if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I love this powerhouse unit.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this spin dryer. We are RV’ers and are gone for weeks at a time. We bought this to go with our Della portable washer which we also love but was tired of wringing out the wet clothes. This wrings the clothes as well if not better than a full size washer in less than 4 minutes. We use both units in our travel trailer tub allowing the water to go down the drain. Saves us both time and money as we only use a laundromat to finish drying if available. Somewhat heavy because of the motor but very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy Dickie

customer_reviews.title: So dry
customer_reviews.text: Clothes are basically dry when they come out I couldn’t believe it. I put soaking wet clothes in and in 5 minutes they were dry. Unbelievable, will update review after 6 months to see if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelybee

customer_reviews.title: Little panda do wonders.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this spin dryer. I used it the same day I got it. I was amazed by how quick my clothes dry. Usually it takes roughly about two days for my clothes to dry when I remove them from the washing machine and hang them to dry. I put them in this little spin panda before I hang them and in a few hours they were dry. I was surprised how much water this little panda spin out of my clothes. I ❤❤ it, give it 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Dolly

customer_reviews.title: I am in heaven
customer_reviews.text: I love this. No laundry in the building and no car. No problem. Got a laundry tool for washing. Laundry racks for drying. But nothing to ring out the clothes. Now do it yourself laundry is awesome again. It is expensive compared to everything else but it is ssssoooooo worth it. If you hand wash clothes you won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and most helpful. I use a kitchen sink basin immediately before putting the wet clothes in as water from the clothes will flood your floor. Need to put the clothes in properly so it doesn't thump around and scare you to death. Live and learn though. Clothes will dry faster and not smell if you use this spin dryer. People used wringers before to get as much water out of the wash. Now you get spin dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable, and low cost, money saving appliance
customer_reviews.text: I have many hand wash only articles of clothing that take along time to drip dry. By using this clothes spinner, all I need is a fan and about 4 hours with the room about 71F-77F, for the clothing to be completely dry. No dripping or mess. Very quick and easy to use. Just follow the direction, as supplied by the manufacturer. Have used similar devices in other countries while traveling. I would recommend this version and model with no hesitation
customer_reviews.author: Clarabelle Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Tiny Condo Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use flour sack towels instead of paper towels and I soak them in bleach and soap overnight then rinse and put in the Panda. They dry completely in an hour just hanging up but are dry enough to use when you take them out. it's great for lingerie, gym clothes, bathing suits, polyester hiking shirts, and microfiber washcloths. Anything else and you can wind up with dry but very wrinkled items that you have to iron. It gets used twice a day. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: I think my jaw dropped a little. . .
customer_reviews.text: Spins out water a drop short of DRY. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: toodance

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the machine "walking" in acceleration and deceleration modes
customer_reviews.text: I've used this drying machine on a daily basis since I bought it. It drains the water very quickly and the clothes come out fairly dry. Highly recommended. I'm taking off one star for two reasons 1. The dryer sometimes "walks" or "rotates" in the acceleration and deceleration modes. I have to press hard on the machine to prevent it from moving as water could be spilled out from the spout. Perhaps I'm not balancing the load evenly inside the machine. 2. This is still bulkier than I expected (think about the size of a large trash can), but it's still substantially smaller than other full-blown drying machines.
customer_reviews.author: Kam S.

customer_reviews.title: its small but mighty. Perfect for apartment too.
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else in the world, I have bags of laundry but unfortunately I can’t leave my apartment so this is a lifesaver. It’s OK to wash your small things by hand but you need something more powerful for pajamas and towels. This is perfect. I’ve done three loads and it’s quiet and gets most of the water out. I can put it in my shower because it’s small and doesn’t weigh a lot. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: New York Real

customer_reviews.title: Loud!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this spinner as Christmas gift and by February after moderate use it got loud. I mean loud like a jet taking off! It does not matter if it is packed full or has single item it screams once it hits full speed. I've contacted the manufacture and they were efficient in responding to me. They want videos and photos. There really isn't much to see, it's a matter of hearing. I feel as though the product was faulty and want it replace. I did not want to have to tear it apart and repair it after just 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Troy W. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s very nice
customer_reviews.text: This little dryer works really nice. Better than what I was expecting. I am kind of bummed out that there’s rust on the inside, it did seem used already but I could’ve been crazy just because there was water marks on the outside , but he rust on the inside ...mmm..I don’t know. It really did help me to get my clothes very dry , air dried my jeans after ..and I feel so comfortable with having clean clothes now!
customer_reviews.author: Tar casya

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to purchase this little guy. He works as well as I expected. I am a tennis player that is the reason I can't put dirty outfits after my playing time to wait for a full load to laundry them. I hand wash my outfits then put them into it then after, from 60-75 seconds, my clothes get 80% dry--then I hang them on line. U can't get wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aroma- Santa Monica

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This spin dryer is really powerful. I was able to spin dry 3 bath towels and 2 of my husband’s jeans in this single load. The fact that it’s white is a bonus because i could use a dry erase marker and write how many pieces of clothing goes in there. Kind of like reminding the husband what to put and not to put. It’s expensive, but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA

customer_reviews.title: Removed more water / minerals than spin cycle.
customer_reviews.text: Europe has larger versions for years .this model works for hand wash ,Towels , jeans, is removed more water than by hand.or the washer spin cycle. Even bed sheets dry quicker. It has a beep when finished , low energy use as it's only a motor no heating element .great for knit clothing ,all auto shut off in a few minutes. Great unit .
customer_reviews.author: Hans K.

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t have a dryer then I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I had fairly low expectations however I’m happy to report this spinner as far exceeded my expectations. My towels came out almost dry. Normally my towels would take almost 2 days to dry However now they were dry in about six hours. Same with my comforters shirts everything else. This item does not dry but it removes 98% of the water. I am seriously impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yorker

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNRELIABLE.
customer_reviews.text: I ONLY USED THE DRYER ABOUT 8 TIMES THEN IT STOPPED WORKING. WHEN I CHECKED,. IT TURNED OUT IT HAS NO WARANTY .
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: This Panda Spin Dryer is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am mesmerized! I watch the amount of water that comes out of the laundry! Wow! 1 load had nearly 3 cups of water that was extracted. IT has cut the drying time in my apartment sized dryer. Even when just hanging the clothes on a drying rack it does NOT take very long. I am pleased with this purchase. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SEW Inspired! Sew Happy!

customer_reviews.title: Love the Panda
customer_reviews.text: Love my Panda! A surprising amount of water spins out of my wash. I have a large washing machine so each load requires 2 loads in the Panda. It spins for about 5 minutes. My clothes dry so quickly. I spin everything in it including sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Lisigirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: My old maytag extractor was built of stronger stuff, but really puts out the water. Had to find a bigger bucket, had to empty a small one twice for almost sopping towels. Load dried to static in 25", usually takes 45". Got the polIcy for 5 yrs, which gives you 4 extra. GLAD I did, hope it lasts. Holding at start & letting it find it's balance really helps.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This spinner will generally do half a load of a bigger washer. Example 2 towels, 2 shirts, a pair of jeans, socks and under ware for 2 people. After I spin the load which takes out about 95 percent of the water I run my dryer on 15 minutes and all dry. If I hang dry it indoors it is usually dry in a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: James M Dakis

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have PTSD now this dryer will give it to you!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to get it to accept any load, have to frequently reposition everything a very particular way for it to spin fast, otherwise just clanks real loud. Often refuses to spin certain kinds of loads - way too fussy of a dryer. Once it gets going though it's very powerful and effective in removing water.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Talaska - Eco Neato

customer_reviews.title: Makes hand-washing practical!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. T shirts come out dry enough that they will hang dry completely in 15 mins with just a little bit of air movement like a fan blowing. Thinner button down shirts are ready to be hung in a closet immediately and thicker socks will dry in maybe a half hour with a fan blowing directly on them. ALSO my hand-washed whites come out WAY cleaner when I use this in between wash and rinsing. Gets all the soap out which means all the grime and stains too. Super quiet too, much quieter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED it till it stopped working :(
customer_reviews.text: It was great. Saved on dryer time. Approx. 2 months after purchase stopped working. It was spinning, started to smell like a burnt engine, then stopped. I did not even open it several weeks after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: barton1010

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so I have no idea how long it will last. So far it is amazing. I have a very fast spin cycle on my front load but this Panda still extracts a cup or more water from a load of non synthetic fabric laundry. My front load has a large capacity so I do 1/2 at a time. I also have a tabletop washer I use for things I want to wash a long time. This spinner sure beats hand wringing. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michiganman

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Family of 6
customer_reviews.text: We currently live in an old Trailsways bus that has been converted into an RV. I purchased another washer/spinner and it didn't do the job that I needed for 6 people. I could only spin one pair of my husbands work jeans/pants at a time and forget any blankets. With this wonderful spinner, not only can I put more clothes in it at one time (which saves on time and electricity = $), but I can also spin some blankets. And it is made more durable then the other one I had! I love this machine! It makes doing laundry so much more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Hooven

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works surprisingly well. The clothes aren't soaking when you take them out so they're able to air dry on a rack or line. There was a dent in it when we received it though. But so far it hasn't gotten worse or made it unable to operate. It's been a great solution for doing laundry in the apartment ourselves without a washer or dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: This works great! I hope it holds up
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I hope it holds up. I will be updating as time goes on. I still have an old one that still runs it is 6 years old. I tried another spin dryer it did not last 6 months. I tried two others that are advertised they didn't spin fast enough to get rid of the water.
customer_reviews.author: campbell6

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I got to replace a similar one from a different brand that bit the dust during a move. Works well, spins out a lot of water; clothes are almost dry, anything with nylon or polyester comes out dry. I wish a container to catch the water came with it instead of finding mixing bowls and such to go under- I wish it just came with one.
customer_reviews.author: Talz

customer_reviews.title: Almost dry!
customer_reviews.text: After my first Panda 3200 spin dryer arrived damaged I contacted customer service and was told it wasn’t fixable so they would send me a new unit. The new unit is wonderful! It spins so much water out of everything that the drying time is almost nothing! I can fit an entire load of laundry in the unit. 2 king sheets and 3 pillow cases fit easy. 2 bath towels 4 hand towels, 7 face cloths 3 kitchen towels .... one load! I love my Panda!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A centrifuge that changed my life for the better.
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing laundry in my Brooklyn tub for four months now, and for the past month this amazing device has cut my drying time from days to hours. I will only have to go back the the laundromat now for blankets. With just a teensy bit of electricity, this dryer has saved me countless quarters and seen me through the 3-month closure of all the laundromats in my neighborhood. It. Has. Changed. My. Life.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: Got it this afternoon and used it an hour later. Works as expected and amazingly well. I like to starch my bedding, including my duet cover. For a long time I am not able to do so because my washing machine doesn't have a spin only cycle. This solved my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pacifica

customer_reviews.title: Works, but LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for well over a year and it does work well and spinning the water out of clothes before I put them into the regular dryer. But this unit is super loud. I have to shut the laundry room door or else it blasts throughout my home. Inside the laundry room? Forget about it. It's deafening. Like a rock concert!
customer_reviews.author: Adam C. Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought Panda spin drier and am very impressed! Weather doing Hand washing or using a machine this cuts drying time down significantly!!!!!i was amazed at how much water came out after using a washing machine. And my clothes and towels are softer coming out of dryer! I no longer use fabric softener. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised, very high quality look and feel
customer_reviews.text: smart safety features, nice looking, really gets rid of most of the water. it just took 4 cups of water out of a full load, and a full load is small. the clothes do NOT come out dry, but very close. we ari dry them after, on a rack. great idea, excellent execution.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Supove/Randy Woolf

customer_reviews.title: Motor doesn't work on the first day
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, followed all instructions. 170$ and doesn't work the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Sims

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for small apartment living. We like to do small laundry loads sometimes and don't want to pay for the dryer so we wash and dry in the apartment. This makes dying so much faster. Things comes out of it barely damp and then I hang them. It's quiet and the cycle is very fast for doing multiple loads. Just watch it at the beginning of the cycle to make sure it's balanced. It looks nice and modern too.
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: this spin really sucks a lot of water out
customer_reviews.text: As long as you blance the clothes out, this spin really sucks a lot of water out. Perfect for my laundry system, which alao includes a hand cranked washer and clothes drying rack.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Coxon

customer_reviews.title: Wrong out a lot of water, laundry drys in no time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 87 year old father who is very neat and hate the gross public laundry in his building. He can use it with ease after I demo it for him. He loves it, reduce the effort on the most difficult part of laundry for him... wringing out the water from the laundry. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I’m so pleased with it. It squeezes the water right out of clothes. It’s quite sturdy too. If it’s out of balance it will dance across your floor tho, and I wish the drain spout was a standard spigot so I could attach a hose but other than that this machine gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: renunciate

customer_reviews.title: Great for hand washing and quick drying
customer_reviews.text: This is great for getting extra water out of the laundry before drying..much better than our front-load washer. It can be tricky to balance a load, but I rarely have problems..Push down once loaded to remove extra space after you add the disk-(always goes on top) that seems to help a lot. try to resist the urge to fill it all the way to the top that usually makes a problem with the balancing... understand that this spins very fast.. and as long as anything doesn't have large pockets of heavy weight, everything will find a balance point..even with jeans, sweaters, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well this machine works it get the wet clothes almost dry it's small and its quiet perfect best money I have spent
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Most Impressive ! !
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive machine for its size. I put a full washer load of t-shirts in it after it was run through an Amana top load washing machine and I got about 1/4 potato kettle more water out of clothes! About 4 cups of water. It's costs a lot of money to evaporate 4 cups water in a dryer each load. This extractor will pay for it self in no time flat. It's quiet, very simple to use, ez to move around and store. It's light. Buy it!! You won't be sorry. Hurry, before they change design and make it less efficient !
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Superb wash by hand solution for RV
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for an rv. It’s very stable during travel and stays upright. It spins more water out than my $1000 washing machine. Love it. Solved our “camping too far from laundry problem”. Takes just a few minutes to spin everything dry. I do two spin cycles, we’re wash and after rinse. It’s so dry that we’ve hung the clothes inside to dry when it was not nice outside.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D.

customer_reviews.title: Low noise, effective and portable spinner
customer_reviews.text: I got my Panda a few weeks ago. I do not have a washing machine so I wash by hand and spin in this spinner. I AM SO PLEASED with this purchase. This was the best decision for me. 25 pounds weight so I can even move it myself. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Louise B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! I LOVE THIS SPIN DRYER!!!!!!! THE BEST!!!! I'm a large person and can easily fit my clothing into this spinner. This spins out several buckets of water from my clothes and they are dry the same day or next day simply because I am larger or have heavy,thick clothing I've used. My first spinner. Love it so much. Great price. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I use this for business and it is a replacement for the laundry alternative spin dryer. I use it multiple times each day. Easy to use, a bit heavier than its LA counterpart, but is more efficient. No handles makes it harder to move around, but stainless steel inside and out is a huge plus. Like others have noted this isn’t a dryer but a spinner that removes nearly all the water allowing air drying time to be greatly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

product_meta.title: Panda 3200 rpm Portable Spin Dryer 110V/22lbs Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless-steelWith a spin speed of 3200rpm this gravity drain spin dryer from Panda is designed to remove as much excess moisture as possible from your laundry, thereby reducing drying times and costs and helping to prolong the life of your laundered items by removing more harmful mineral deposits and detergents than your washing machine can alone. They are easy to move and small enough to operate in a restricted space. Our spin dryers remove excess moisture from your washing load in a speedy and efficient manner, leaving it with less residual water. It is very gentle on your clothes. Stainless steel drum to ensure long life. Completely Safe with Safety Locking Lid and Stabilizing rubber feet. Model: PANSP22 Voltage Frequency: 110V-120V/60Hz Capacity Max: 16-22lbs Spin RMP: 3200 Power: 300W Stainless Steel Drum Color of outer case: Stainless Steel Material of outer case: Stainless Steel Safety Locking Lid Stabilizing rubber feet Dimension: measuring 25. 5 inch tall with a diameter of 13. 5 inch Weight: 26 lbs Please acknowledge before purchasing: This is the spin dryer, not a heated dryer, it does not 100% dry the clothes. It does spin function which the spin speed is ultra fast, 3200rpm, it gets washing slightly damp and saves line time. THIS IS A LAUNDRY SPIN DRYER FOR HOUSEHOLD USE ONLY *This machine was designed to process normal household quantities only. Not suitable for continuous operation or commercial use. **It is for regular load only. Overloading will negatively impact wash performance. ***We reserve the right to refuse any returns for objective reasons.
